title: Similar DIN font
content:
Hello,   
   
Does anybody kows a font, similar to DIN font, with a little more rounded "C"?   
   
thanks a lot   
jenz
author: yenzen

comments.content:
Lovely ' [Flama](http://web.archive.org/web/20070620185437/http:/www.secretonix.pt/ftf/catalogue/FTFflama00.htm)', by Mï¿½rio Feliciano, maybe.?   
   
_Edit.: Well.. Or even the new 'Designers DIN's.: ' [CP Company](http://web.archive.org/web/20070620185437/http:/www.fsd.it/fonts/cp.htm)', by Fabrizio Schiavi, and, ' [Aaux](http://web.archive.org/web/20070620185437/http:/www.positype.com/source/fontview.php?id=2)', by Neil Summerour.?_
